descriptionHTML:
Equipping yourself with a virtual assistant WearvisPro, you can master all the details around. The design is inspired by J.A.R.V.I.S.
NOTE: Please make sure your watch is running Android Wear 5.0.



Features on one face:
✔ 3D Parallax effect
✔ Wifi state
✔ Compass
✔ Weather
✔ Temperature
✔ Rotating second
✔ Watch/phone battery level
✔ Step count
✔ Month, Date and Day
✔ Color picker for outer circle contour
✔ Color picker for weather icon
✔ Display in dimmed mode
✔ 12/24 hour


Support all models:
✔ LG G Watch R
✔ Motorola Moto 360
✔ Samsung Gear Live
✔ Asus Zen Watch
✔ LG G watch
✔ Sony SmartWatch 3


Weather support:
http://openweathermap.org/


How to launch:
1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.
2. Long press the watch screen and select WearvisPro from the watch face picker
3. You might need to wait a second before the app is synced for both phone and watch.


LEGAL: J.A.R.V.I.S is a copyright of Marvel Entertainment, LLC. This product is not affiliated with, nor authorized, endorsed or licensed in any way by Marvel Entertainment, LLC and its affiliates or subsidiaries.
comments: This app was completely inaccurate in step counting and in temp. Worse it acted viral by continually placing itself on my phones home screen.

Awesome This is by far the best watch face I have ever used, but there are some things that need to be able to change. There should be a 12hour clock and the ability to reset steps because it looks odd past the hundreds. Add those and 5 stars all the way
Good..but It is a cool app...but the developer should develop the ability to change the icons....I would rather have #of messages vs step count as an example...change this and it is 5 ☆
Awesome watch face Thanks for designing such a great watchface....especially in dimmed mode.
Bought this thinking it was cool but.... It is not showing up as an option for a watch face
Cool but.... Needs the ability to change some things.
recentChanges: 1. Add 12/24 hour option in Pro version.
4. Automatically reset step count at start of each day.
